questions.question: Hello, How are you?
answers: Fine until you got here, pig

questions.question: I'm ****, do you have an ID on you?
answers: I didnt do anything wrong, I know my rights!
I don't have it on me right now.

answers: Just these guns right here. *flexes arms*
Just the handgun in my waistband.

answers: I think so but it was a long time ago.

answers: Probably with you once you run my license

answers: No, but Im sure you're going to tell me.

Because I was going a little too fast.

answers: I was doing like 5mph over, so what?
No, But you're going to tell me.

answers: I got the need, the need for speed!
Sorry man, I just watched TopGun.

answers: Nothing, Im just trying to find my....

answers: Police make me nervous, look at the damn news.

answers: I didnt see a stop sign.
I just rolled it, whats the big deal.
